BenchPress.name: Bench Press
description: Lie face up on a flat bench with a barbell support rack
With a spotter standing behind you safely lift the bar of the rack
While at the top of the movement adjust your shoulders down and back
Lower the bar until it lightly touches your chest without flaring your elbows out
Using your chest muscles to engage in the movement press the bar back up to the starting position
Adjust your shoulders if needed before repeating the movement
properForm: Plant feet firmly on the floor
Squeeze your glutes, lats, and core to brace your body against the bench

InclineBenchPress.name: Incline Bench Press
description: Lie face up on a flat bench raised to 30-40 degrees incline with a barbell support rack
With a spotter standing behind you safely lift the bar of the rack
While at the top of the movement adjust your shoulders down and back
Lower the bar until it lightly touches your chest without flaring your elbows out
Using your chest muscles to engage in the movement press the bar back up to the starting position
Adjust your shoulders if needed before repeating the movement
properForm: Plant feet firmly on the floor
Squeeze your glutes, lats, and core to brace your body against the bench

DeclineBenchPress.name: Decline Bench Press
description: Lie face up on a decline bench with a barbell support rack
With a spotter standing behind you safely lift the bar of the rack
While at the top of the movement adjust your shoulders down and back
Lower the bar until it lightly touches your chest without flaring your elbows out
Using your chest muscles to engage in the movement press the bar back up to the starting position
Adjust your shoulders if needed before repeating the movement
properForm: Plant feet firmly on the floor
Squeeze your glutes, lats, and core to brace your body against the bench

DBChestPress.name: Dumbbell Chest Press
description: Place the dumbbells on your knees in a seated position on a flat bench
Rock backwards keeping your arms straight and lie down on your back with the dumbbells over your chest
While at the top of the movement adjust your shoulders down and back
Lower the dumbbells until your arms are parallel with the floor without flaring your elbows out
Using your chest muscles to engage in the movement press the dumbbells back up to the starting position
Adjust your shoulders if needed before repeating the movement
properForm: Plant feet firmly on the floor
Squeeze your glutes, lats, and core to brace your body against the bench

InclineDBChestPress.name: Incline Dumbbell Chest Press
description: Place the dumbbells on your knees in a seated position on a flat bench with a 30-40 degree incline
Rock backwards keeping your arms straight and lie down on your back with the dumbbells over your chest
While at the top of the movement adjust your shoulders down and back
Lower the dumbbells until your arms are parallel with the floor without flaring your elbows out
Using your chest muscles to engage in the movement press the dumbbells back up to the starting position
Adjust your shoulders if needed before repeating the movement
properForm: Plant feet firmly on the floor
Squeeze your glutes, lats, and core to brace your body against the bench

DeclineDBChestPress.name: Decline Dumbbell Chest Press
description: Lie face up on a decline bench
Have a spotter carefully hand you the dumbbells over head
While at the top of the movement adjust your shoulders down and back
Lower the dumbbells until your arms are parallel with the floor without flaring your elbows out
Using your chest muscles to engage in the movement press the dumbbells back up to the starting position
Adjust your shoulders if needed before repeating the movement
properForm: Plant feet firmly on the floor
Squeeze your glutes, lats, and core to brace your body against the bench
